column1: '''Gollum's Song''' is song performed [[Emilíana Torrini]] for [[Peter Jackson|Peter Jackson's]] ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''. It is the a song written from the perspective of [[Gollum]]. Originally
column2: it was supposed to be sung by [[Wikipedia:Björk|Björk]]
column3: but she declined due to pregnancy.

column1: It is the nineteenth track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' and formed part of "[[Long Ways to Go Yet]]"
column2: track fourteen of disc three of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - The Complete Recordings]]''.

column1: For all the lies you told us
And we will weep to be so alone
I'll be what I will be
When you face the end alone
[[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]
